item.title: Codeigniter and React Developer Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We have built a codeigniter 4 backend with react chat (frontend) module and node.js chat backend. We wish to

1. Integrate Google my business chat & reviews.
2. Real-time Notifications and notification sounds for chat module..
3. Improve chat module overall efficiency.

Host system on AWS and deliver to client.

You must have expert level command on php, codeigniter 4, react, websocket, node.js & rest api’s in order to deliver this task.
You Must have experience working with meta API's and google my business review and chat API's

Note: Developers from Pakistan may not apply due to code privacy and confidentiality concerns, Thank You.

Budget: $500
Posted On: May 19, 2024 12:25 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:React, CodeIgniter, PHP, Node.js, REST API, Websockets, Google APIs, Instagram API
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: Vue to React Conversion for PDF Generation - Upwork
item.description:
Шукаю кваліфікованого розробника для конвертації наших існуючих компонентів Vue в React з метою створення PDF-файлів. Метою є міграція фронтенд-компонентів, що забезпечить їх безперебійну роботу в середовищі React. Перетворені компоненти будуть використовуватися разом з іншими бібліотеками та end-point
Необхідні навички:
- Vue.js
- React
- Створення PDF-файлів
- Фронтенд розробка
- Чисті та підтримувані практики кодування

Термін виконання 24 години

Budget: $200
Posted On: May 19, 2024 12:10 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:JavaScript, HTML, CSS, HTML5, Python
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: We are seeking a skilled software developer to create AI tools - Upwork
item.description:
Upscale (Image Quality Enhancement):
A system will be developed to upscale images by 2x, 4x, and 8x with a user interface similar to Remini.
User Restrictions:
Free users will have a daily limit of 1 upscale.
Premium users will have unlimited access.
Background Removal:
A feature will be provided to remove the background of uploaded photos.
User Restrictions:
Free users will be able to process 1 photo per day.
Premium users will have unlimited access.
Perplexica Integration from github:
Integration Features:
The Perplexica Repository will be integrated.
Free users will be able to perform 5 searches per day using ChatGPT-3.5.
Premium users will have the right to perform 40 searches per day using ChatGPT-4.
The Pro search feature will be developed!
Chat Pulling using LEBO-CHAT:
Convert:
Will convert uploaded files to the desired format (pdf, doc, jpg, png, svg, rtf, gif) upon command.
Stock:
Will allow querying of live stock values.
Weather:
Will provide live weather information.
Chrome Pulling:
An extension similar to Sider A.I will be made; it will only have functions for translation, explanation, image descriptions, and asking questions.

Budget: $500
Posted On: May 19, 2024 11:18 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Next.js, GitHub, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Python
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: React Build Expert for android and IoS Build from Monorepo - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there,


We are using Expo react native for building our product and we are bundling three platforms out of one code base which is android, ios and web.

We have configured a monorepo setup for front-end.
We have configured monorepo using yarn classic i.e. 1.22.9.

We have made the changes in the code and extracted our UI library out of our apps and made them as packages to be shared across all apps.

In the packages dir we have our custom library which i being used in apps/* any workspace.

We are not able to build it now and facing some issues, Need someone who can do it today

Budget: $100
Posted On: May 19, 2024 09:16 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Native App Development, React Native, Android, iOS, React, Mobile App Development, iOS Development
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Full-Stack Developer - build our modular site generation service. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced Full-Stack Developer to build our modular site generation service. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining the core components that pull data from LinkedIn, process the data, and populate web templates to generate static sites. Your code should be ultra-modular, adhering to common APIs and standards, ensuring flexibility for future service enhancements. The solution should be containerized to enable scalable deployment using Kubernetes.

Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain the LinkedIn data fetching service.
Develop data processing modules to clean, format, and organize LinkedIn data.
Create a template rendering service to generate static web pages using processed data.
Ensure the system is modular, maintainable, and adheres to industry standards and best practices.
Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate the generated static sites seamlessly.
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
Implement unit and integration tests to ensure the reliability and stability of the services.
Containerize the application for scalable deployment using Docker and Kubernetes.
Collaborate with the DevOps team to integrate CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the platform remains innovative.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Full-Stack Developer or similar role.
Strong proficiency in server side JavaScript (Node.js) and Python.
Experience with RESTful APIs and common API standards.
Familiarity with data processing and transformation techniques.
Experience with template engines (e.g., EJS, Handlebars, or similar).
Strong understanding of modular architecture and microservices.
Proficient with version control systems (e.g., Git).
Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with LinkedIn API and OAuth.
Knowledge of front-end technologies (e.g., React.js).
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
Understanding of CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.


Budget: $500
Posted On: May 19, 2024 08:51 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Node.js, Python, Prototype JavaScript Framework, Handlebars, Git, GitHub, Docker, API
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Next JS and Supabase Expert to help deliver a webapp feature - Upwork
item.description:
This is a part-time contract project, with possibility to become full-time.

**Please read below requirements carefully**

Please make sure you are fluent in both Next.JS, and Supabase before you apply. We are NOT looking at Next/React native. Please show projects made in these required framework.
Please make sure you attach a resume and github link in your application otherwise your application is automatically passed.


Responsibilities:
Build features in required environment following our detailed tickets in PR. Integrate with Supabase backend for seamless data flow.
Implement robust user authentication and authorization mechanisms.
Thoroughly test all features to ensure they function as expected (assistance provided).
Deploy the web app on a hosting platform such as Vercel.
Iterate product with the team.

Qualifications:
1. Proficiency in React/Next.js with TypeScript/Javascript.
2. Proficiency in Supabase.
3. Fluency in HTML, CSS, and related web technologies
4. Strong understanding of frontend and backend integration.
5. Excellent communication and collaboration skills and the ability to work well within engineering organization and cross functions.
6. Love collaborating via code reviews and architecture discussions, and are motivated to improve their teammates' productivity
7. Awareness of cross-browser compatibility issues and client-side performance considerations
8. Show motivation for personal growth and learning new technologies to support the team's needs

Bonus:
1. Experience in creating SEO-optimized and scalable web applications is a plus.
2. Experience working on an Infrastructure or Platform team supporting a small to meidum engineering organization. Prior experience in venture-backed startups is a plus.
3. Solid understanding of client networking, performance, caching, client storage solutions, and asynchronous programming.
4. Experience (beyond configuration) working with bundlers, testing frameworks, editor integrations, frontend build/CI systems, observability tooling, or developer environments.

Budget: $800
Posted On: May 19, 2024 08:07 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Next.js, Vercel, TypeScript, Supabase, CSS
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create Profile Page With Django, Javascript and React Native - Upwork
item.description:
We have a new mobile app that needs member's profile page. Everything is done on the website but pulled into mobile using react native's webview. We need a member's profile page with the following functionalities. You will need to work with UI designed to come up with a profile page with the following features, then you will implement the UI and build the functionality.
1. A member page will show member picture.
The picture is gotten from a response to "birthday_picture_request". Only a direct response to this request becomes profile picture.
2. A member page will display member's birthday.
3. A member's page will show donation/contribution history
4. A member's page will show conversation history with noqnoq

Budget: $150
Posted On: May 19, 2024 00:01 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Django, JavaScript, React Native
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Help connect my Next JS Template to my Django backend - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description:

We have an existing Django backend using the Oscar ecommerce framework with a built-in API. We've purchased a Next.js template for the frontend but need help integrating the two seamlessly.

Key Responsibilities:

API Integration:
Analyze the Oscar API endpoints and data structures.
Adapt the Next.js template components to fetch and display product data, category information, shopping cart details, and other relevant information from the Django backend.
Troubleshoot and resolve any issues preventing successful data display.
Data Formatting:
Evaluate whether data formatting is the root cause of display issues.
If needed, implement appropriate data transformations or normalization on the frontend or backend to ensure compatibility.
State Management:
Implement state management solutions (e.g., React Context, Redux, Zustand) to handle shopping cart updates, product selections, and user interactions.


Required Skills & Experience:

Proficiency in Next.js: Strong understanding of Next.js concepts (server-side rendering, routing, component architecture).
REST API Experience: Experience working with RESTful APIs, particularly consuming data.
JavaScript Expertise: Advanced knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+) and React.
Django/Oscar Familiarity (Preferred): Basic understanding of Django and the Oscar framework would be beneficial.
Problem-Solving Skills: Ability to debug and resolve integration challenges.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous approach to ensure data accuracy and seamless user experience.
Additional Information:

Project Timeline: [Estimated duration, 1-2 weeks]
Communication: Regular communication (e.g., daily updates, video calls) is essential.
Deliverables:
A fully functional Next.js frontend integrated with the Django Oscar backend.
Well-documented code.
Clear instructions for future maintenance and updates.

Budget: $100
Posted On: May 18, 2024 20:12 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript, React, Django, Web Development, RESTful API, Node.js, CSS, HTML, API
Country: United States
click to apply
item.content:encoded:
Project Description:

We have an existing Django backend using the Oscar ecommerce framework with a built-in API. We've purchased a Next.js template for the frontend but need help integrating the two seamlessly.

Key Responsibilities:

API Integration:
Analyze the Oscar API endpoints and data structures.
Adapt the Next.js template components to fetch and display product data, category information, shopping cart details, and other relevant information from the Django backend.
Troubleshoot and resolve any issues preventing successful data display.
Data Formatting:
Evaluate whether data formatting is the root cause of display issues.
If needed, implement appropriate data transformations or normalization on the frontend or backend to ensure compatibility.
State Management:
Implement state management solutions (e.g., React Context, Redux, Zustand) to handle shopping cart updates, product selections, and user interactions.


Required Skills & Experience:

Proficiency in Next.js: Strong understanding of Next.js concepts (server-side rendering, routing, component architecture).
REST API Experience: Experience working with RESTful APIs, particularly consuming data.
JavaScript Expertise: Advanced knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+) and React.
Django/Oscar Familiarity (Preferred): Basic understanding of Django and the Oscar framework would be beneficial.

Project Timeline: [Estimated duration, 1-2 weeks]
Communication: Regular communication (e.g., daily updates, video calls) is essential.
Deliverables:
A fully functional Next.js frontend integrated with the Django Oscar backend.
Well-documented code.
Clear instructions for future maintenance and updates.

item.title: Need to automate the process of building a Flutter app from existing React and ASP.NET code. - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled full-stack developer with expertise in React.js, ASP.NET Core, and Flutter to transform our existing web application into a mobile application. Our objective is to establish a streamlined process for creating Flutter mobile builds from our regularly updated web codebase.

Key Responsibilities:
• Integrate our current React.js and ASP.NET Core web applications into a Flutter mobile app.
• Develop a system for continuous builds of the mobile application from the existing web codebase with minimal modifications.
• Implement a web-based mobile application approach, such as Progressive Web Apps (PWA), to enable rapid deployment on both Android and iOS platforms.
• Provide a detailed project proposal with options and a strategic approach to efficiently achieve this integration.

Requirements:
•  Proven experience in React.js and ASP.NET Core development.
•  Strong expertise in Flutter and mobile app development.
• Familiarity with Progressive Web Apps (PWA) or similar web-based mobile application methodologies.
•  Ability to work with existing codebases and integrate them into new frameworks with minimal changes.
• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications:
•  Experience in creating systems for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).
• Prior experience in projects involving the integration of web applications into mobile platforms.

Application Instructions:
Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter, and a project proposal outlining your approach to this integration, including your recommended options and timeline.

We look forward to seeing how you can help us achieve a seamless and efficient mobile application integration.


Budget: $100
Posted On: May 18, 2024 12:11 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Flutter, React, API, Node.js, ASP.NET
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Blockchain Developer Solana - Upwork
item.description:
ONLY REACT IF YOU MEET THE FOLLOWING CRITERIA:

- You are part of a company with multiple developers.
- You have experience with developing on the Solana blockchain and can explain what Pnft is. Include your explanation in your application.
- You are willing to complete a test project before formal engagement.
- You are available to work weekends as needed.

Position Overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Rust and Solidity Developer to join our dynamic team. This role requires deep technical knowledge in blockchain development and a commitment to innovative problem solving.

Key Responsibilities:

-Develop high-quality software using Rust and Solidity, focusing on performance and reliability.
-Design and implement smart contracts on the Solana blockchain.
- Collaborate with various teams to understand project requirements and deliver technical solutions.
- Maintain and improve code quality through writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
- Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
- Address software issues and contribute to project deliverables on schedule.
- Keep abreast of new technologies and best practices in the industry.

Essential Skills & Qualifications:

- Strong proficiency in Rust and extensive experience with Solidity smart contracts.
- Demonstrable success in complex software project delivery.
- Familiarity with ChatGPT Pro integration into software applications.
- Excellent analytical skills with detail-oriented problem-solving abilities.
- Effective under tight deadlines and within a dynamic working environment.
- Proficient in collaborative teamwork across functional groups.
- Deep understanding of blockchain technology and decentralized applications.
- Experienced with Git or similar version control systems.

Preferred Additional Qualifications:

- Proficiency in other programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, or C++.
- Knowledge of front-end frameworks (React, Angular, etc.) and - - DevOps practices including CI/CD pipelines.

Application Process:
If you meet all the above requirements and are ready to tackle exciting challenges in blockchain development, we look forward to your application. Please be sure to include your experience with Solana and a brief explanation of Pnft in your response.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: May 18, 2024 09:26 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:Rust, API Development, ChatGPT, AI Development, Blockchain, Blockchain Architecture, Smart Contract, Solana
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: via Chatgpt Mutliuser Chatapp - Upwork
item.description:
Index: It is available as HTML, and you need to convert it to Next.js.
User: You need to create the login/register/forgot password/user settings pages as UI. I can show you an example design along with their functions.
Billing: You need to create a pricing page. We will find an example design together. There will be one option for $9.99 which will allow access to the translation page and use of ChatGPT 4.0 for premium members with a daily limit of 15k tokens. Additionally, you will place billing somewhere on the user settings page where Stripe invoices will be listed.
Stripe: Stripe integration is needed for purchasing premium membership.
Admin: Login/Dashboard

Total number of members
Number of members registered today, this week, this month, and in total
Number of members who made purchases today, this week, this month, and in total
Current number of active users
Number of ChatGPT 3.5 tokens consumed today, this week, this month, and in total - Member List - Member list page - Edit member page - Delete member page - Read chat history
Chatbot:
Repo: Please set up and test "github /lobehub/lobe-chat"

UI Changes: A few changes need to be made in the UI: add a button to delete all chats, display remaining tokens, limit the model selection, allow chat name changes, and remove 2-3 functions.
Translate: This will only be visible to premium members and will display the used and remaining token count in one place.
Translate Page: You will slightly modify the UI of the translate page according to Lobe Chat and set it up using "github openai-translator/openai-translator".

Budget: $500
Posted On: May 18, 2024 07:19 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:OpenAI API, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Generative AI
Country: Turkey
click to apply

item.title: Looking for WebGL Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and implement WebGL-based applications and interactive experiences, including 2D and 3D graphics rendering, animations, and visual effects.
Collaborate with designers and developers to translate concepts and designs into functional and visually appealing web applications.
Utilize Inkscape and other design tools to modify SVG vectors and coordinates and create or modify SVG elements and components.
Manage vector files and assets, ensuring efficient storage, organization, and accessibility for development and production purposes.
Optimize performance and ensure compatibility across different web browsers and devices, including desktop and mobile platforms.
Manipulate objects, paths, nodes, and anchors to edit and refine their designs

Programming Languages:
TypeScript & JavaScript: Expertise in building interactive web applications using modern frameworks and libraries (e.g., React, Angular, Node.js).
Proficient in handling asynchronous operations, API integrations, and frontend-backend communication.
C++: Advanced knowledge in system-level programming, memory management, and performance optimization. Experience in developing complex algorithms and working with graphics rendering engines.
Net and .net wrappers
Graphics and Rendering:
WebGL: In-depth understanding of WebGL for hardware-accelerated 2D and 3D graphics rendering in web browsers. Experience in shader programming and optimization.
Knowledge of the SwiftShader library for CPU-based implementation of WebGL and Vulkan specifications.

If you believe that your skills and expertise align with the requirements of this position, please send us your CV for review. Additionally, if you have a portfolio or examples of previous work, we would be interested in seeing them. We are eager to assess your qualifications and establish a cooperative relationship as soon as possible.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: May 18, 2024 06:19 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:JavaScript
Country: Vietnam
click to apply

item.title: [$250] Tags - After deleting a Tag, the select button is not showing the correct amount #42271 - Expensify - Upwork
item.description:
Expensify is a team of generalists developing today's leading expense management tool. Maintaining our reputation as an innovative leader in the world of finance requires an incredibly reliable and secure system for processing financial transactions. Accordingly, we primarily leverage time-tested languages, but we're looking to unify our front-end across platforms. For this, we're leveraging React Native and are looking toward the community on Upwork to help solve a variety of problems, both big and small, related to this migration.

Please see the GitHub issue for full details: github.com/Expensify/App/issues/42271

Your Proposal:

- You *must* post a proposal for how you will fix this issue in the GitHub issue linked above.
- Your proposal should include a technical explanation of the changes you will make. You are not required to submit the final solution or code along with your proposal.
- Your proposal will be reviewed.
- If your proposal is accepted, you should post the proposal in Upwork and you will be hired for the job.
- AFTER your proposal is accepted in Upwork and you have accepted the offer, you may submit the code to implement your solution. To submit the code, go to the Expensify/App GitHub repo where you'll create a fork of our codebase. You'll create a branch on that fork, and when your code is ready for review, you'll create a pull request in our repository to merge your code into our codebase. Include screenshots and confirmation that you have tested the pull request on all platforms. Our engineers will review the code, and approve and merge when the code meets our requirements.

Please review our Contributor Guidelines before submitting a proposal - github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md

**Important:** As documented in our CONTRIBUTING.md, payment amounts are variable, dependent on any regressions your work causes.

Budget: $250
Posted On: May 18, 2024 00:28 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Country: United States
click to apply
